languages.text: "Сытая жизнь туманит ум и развращает дух. Испытания — вот, что делает подданных Домин сильнее".

traits.locale_text: "Сытая жизнь туманит ум и развращает дух. Испытания — вот что делает подданных Домин сильнее".

languages.text: "A life of satiety clouds the mind and rots the spirit. It is hardship that makes the Domin's subjects stronger."
languages.original_text: "Сытая жизнь туманит ум и развращает дух. Испытания — вот, что делает подданных Домин сильнее".

traits.locale_text: "A life of satiety clouds the mind and rots the spirit. It is hardship that makes the Domin's subjects stronger."
"A life of satiety clouds the mind and rots the spirit. It is hardship that makes the Domin's subjects stronger."
"A life of satiety clouds the mind and rots the spirit. It is hardship that makes the Domin's subjects stronger."
"A life of satiety clouds the mind and rots the spirit. It is hardship that makes the Domin's subjects stronger."
"A life of satiety clouds the mind and rots the spirit. It is hardship that makes the Domin's subjects stronger."
"A life of satiety clouds the mind and rots the spirit. It is hardship that makes the Domin's subjects stronger."

languages.text: 「満ち足りた生活は思考を鈍らせ、精神を腐らせる。苦難こそがドミンの臣民を強くするのだ」
languages.original_text: "A life of satiety clouds the mind and rots the spirit. It is hardship that makes the Domin's subjects stronger."

traits.locale_text: 「満ち足りた生活は思考を鈍らせ、精神を腐らせる。苦難こそがドミンの臣民を強くするのだ」

languages.text: "Ein sattes Leben trübt den Verstand und lässt den Geist verkommen. Durch Mühsal werden die Untertanen {mf|des|der} Domin stärker."
languages.original_text: "A life of satiety clouds the mind and rots the spirit. It is hardship that makes the Domin's subjects stronger."

traits.locale_text: "Ein sattes Leben trübt den Verstand und lässt den Geist verkommen. Durch Mühsal werden die Untertanen {mf|des|der} Domin stärker."

languages.text: « Une vie de satiété embrume l'esprit et putréfie l'âme. C'est dans l'adversité que les sujets {mf|du|de la} Domin gagnent en force. »
languages.original_text: "A life of satiety clouds the mind and rots the spirit. It is hardship that makes the Domin's subjects stronger."

traits.locale_text: « Une vie de satiété embrume l'esprit et putréfie l'âme. C'est dans l'adversité que les sujets {mf|du|de la} Domin gagnent en force. »

languages.text: «Una vida de saciedad nubla la mente y pudre el espíritu. Las penurias fortalecen a los súbditos {mf|del|de la} Domin».
languages.original_text: "A life of satiety clouds the mind and rots the spirit. It is hardship that makes the Domin's subjects stronger."

traits.locale_text: «Una vida de saciedad nubla la mente y pudre el espíritu. Las penurias fortalecen a los súbditos {mf|del|de la} Domin».

languages.text: “餍足的生活会蒙蔽思想，腐蚀灵魂，只有苦难才能让秘者的臣民变得更加强大。”
languages.original_text: "A life of satiety clouds the mind and rots the spirit. It is hardship that makes the Domin's subjects stronger."

traits.locale_text: “餍足的生活会蒙蔽思想，腐蚀灵魂，只有苦难才能让秘者的臣民变得更加强大。”

languages.text: "Doygun bir hayat, zihni bulandırıp ruhu çürütür. Domin'in tebaası, zorluklardan güç bulur."
languages.original_text: "A life of satiety clouds the mind and rots the spirit. It is hardship that makes the Domin's subjects stronger."

traits.locale_text: "Doygun bir hayat zihni bulandırır, ruhu çürütür. Domin tebaası, zorluklardan güç bulur."

languages.original_text: "A life of satiety clouds the mind and rots the spirit. It is hardship that makes the Domin's subjects stronger."
